headline: Marriott International Announces Release Date For Second Quarter 2025 Earnings
summary: Marriott International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAR) will report second quarter 2025 earnings results on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, at approximately 7:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET). The company will hold a conference call for the investment community on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, at 8:30 a.m. (ET). Marriott International's President and Chief Executive Officer, Anthony Capuano, and Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President, Development, Leeny Oberg, will discuss the company's performance.

headline: Atrium Hospitality Launches AtriumRISE Training Program to Encourage Advancement in Hotel Leadership
summary: ALPHARETTA, Ga., July 08, 2025--Atrium Hospitality debuts AtriumRISE, the company’s nine-month Hotel General Manager Development Program.

headline: Marriott International's Caribbean Luxury Resorts Lead the Way in 2025's Changing Travel Trends
summary: As the travel industry enters the second half of 2025, a new wave of behavior is shaping how and where people vacation. From spur-of-the-moment bookings and multi-generational traditions to mindful escapes and emerging luxury destinations, this season reflects a more thoughtful, flexible approach to travel. While the economic climate brings a degree of caution, traveler demand remains resilient shaped less by urgency and more by intention.

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
